text: What is the logic for Bidiagonal matrices being restricted to being square?

elements.text: What is the logic for Bidiagonal matrices being restricted to being square?

text: They were introduced exclusively for calling LAPACK’s SVD routines so we didn’t consider the non-square case. I assume you have the n+1xn case in mind

elements.text: They were introduced exclusively for calling LAPACK’s SVD routines so we didn’t consider the non-square case. I assume you have the n+1xn case in mind

text: Yes. Would  you be open to some generalizations here?

elements.text: Yes. Would  you be open to some generalizations here?
